actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend coverage under the flood insurance program to include  landslides as well as losses from mudslides.

summary.text: Amends the National Flood Insurance Act to extend coverage under the flood insurance program to include losses from landslides.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend coverage under the flood insurance program to include  landslides as well as losses from mudslides.
